name: places/ChIJqYtMeQFZwokRDnfLBYAqYWw
formattedAddress: 125 Park Ave, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 125 Park Ave, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: Great gym.  Been going to this location on and off for about 4 years now.  Always greeted with a smile regardless of who is at the front desk.  Everything is clean.  Especially due to Covid-19, I see this place constantly being sprayed and wiped down.  Definitely way better than many other locations I've visited.  SPECIAL SHOUT OUT TO THE HARDEST WORKING MAN IN THEIR STAFF, JOSEPH!!!  The entire staff works hard but Joseph is someone you will constantly see moving around cleaning and making sure this gym is nothing short of amazing.  I asked him "How is everything?"  He simply and sincerely replied "I'm having fun!"

originalText.text:
Very hard to work out here since it is crowded all the time. Worst times are M-F from 4:30 to 9PM.

Gym is clean, staff is nice and cordial and the equipment is new and well kept.

One big compliant is that they keep the Gym cold. Even after working out and having my heart rate reach 170 beats per minute, I don’t even sweat cause it is so cold. Guess they don’t want you to sweat cause it is more to clean. Hope the manger fixes this as being cold while you workout is just not comfortable and even may cause you to get sick.

originalText.text:
I LIKE THIS BLINK ALOT , FOR ONE IT HAS THE ABSOLUTE  MOST SPACE I HAVE EVER SEEN IN ANY FITNESS  GYM , ALL THE EQUIPMENT  IS NICELY  SPACED OUT, THEIR WAS NO REAL WAITING TIME FOR EQUIPMENT,  VERY CLEAN AS EXPECTED,  BUT MOST OF ALL I APPRECIATE  REPRESENTATIVE  TREVOR VERY VERY NICE YOUNG MAN, VERY RESPECTFUL  VERY HELPFUL,  PLUS IT IS  RIGHT NEXT TO THE SUBWAY. 4,5, AND 6 TRAIN AS WELL AS THE METRO NORTH.. ONE THING THOUGH IF YOU DONT PAY ATTENTION YOU CAN WALK RIGHT PASS THE  GYM,  THERE IS NOT MUCH...
TO EAT BUT THEIR  ARE A COUPLE THINGS TO EAT IN THE MCDONALD'S,  HALE AND  HEARTY, AND I THINK A WALK TO WOK RESTAURANT,  DONT QUOTE ME ON THAT...

originalText.text: I have been a member only a short time but I am happy! It’s nice to have a safe, air conditioned place to jog in the summer. I only wish the gym stayed open  until 11 pm seven days a week.

text.text: I have been a member only a short time but I am happy! It’s nice to have a safe, air conditioned place to jog in the summer. I only wish the gym stayed open  until 11 pm seven days a week.

originalText.text: Yooooooo!!!! Blink Bryant Park what the hell?!!! The news has literally been reporting a heat wave was coming and you all don’t have the A/C working?!!! This is not even the first time this has happened but on days like today, what the hell are you all doing with our membership and personal training money that you can’t make sure the A/C is working on one of the hottest days of the summer? This is absolutely ridiculous that you all do not keep up with this but you all certainly have no trouble taking our money on time. Definitely making me reconsider spending more money to go to a gym that cares more about their members.
